blog.name: fedonciadale
blog.title: FedonCiadale
blog.description: Fantasy aficionado since I read Tolkien in my teenage years. I still love Tolkien but I am also into other works. I love ASOIAF (books) and GoT (Show). I also like Brandon Sanderson, Lois McMaster Bujold, in short in my free time it's fantasy...Header by courtesy of ragekitn!

summary: What's important in the promo isn't that arya is amazed by a thing she thinks is cool because duh. What is important is the fact...
question: What's important in the promo isn't that arya is amazed by a thing she thinks is cool because duh. What is important is the fact that EVERYONE ELSE in the background is freaking out and terrified. D will not be viewed as a benevolent helper, she will be viewed as the dragon wielding conqueror.
answer:
Dear nonny,

I do think both are important. Arya the adventurer is excited. I think it is important to show how fearless she has become and the juxtaposition to the scared smallfolk certainly proves that point. It is interesting that the new scene calls back two other scenes (at least two I am aware of), the first being Tyrion awestruck when he first saw a dragon - and look how he looks at them now. The second being the very first episode, where adventurous Arya looked excited with the very same facial expression when she spotted King Robert and the Lannister army. It makes me wonder what else from the first episode we’ll see? Another handshake of Jon and Jaime? Another crypt scene? Maybe Sansa telling Jon that Queen Dany cannot have him, like Cat told Ned?

Anyway I think it is a very interesting shot. I’m not yet sure, if Arya gazing at a dragon above really comes directly after the other scene, but it might well be. Arya will be disenchanted fast enough, just like with King Robert.

Thanks for the ask!

blog.name: acourtofhopeanddreams
blog.title: Enjoy the little things!
blog.description:
Open your heart
To the love of the world
It only needs one person
Touching it with 
A word
A look
A smile
A kiss

title: Freezing
body:
Written for day 2 of @asoiafrarepairs week round 2 based on the prompt “Burning OR Freezing”

When Arya wakes up she notices that it snows and rushes outside, convinced she’s immune to cold. Daenerys, her girlfriend, isn’t so certain about that, but she has never seen snow before.

modern au

“It’s snowing!” Arya rushed to her window and a smile spread across her face when she saw the bright white tapestry in front of her. “Come on! I want to be the first to set foot into it!” She reached for Daenerys’ hand and pulled the girl along down the stairs.

“Dressed like this?” Daenerys raised her eyebrows and freed her hand from Arya’s strong hold. “You will freeze to death!”

Arya rolled her eyes. “Of course not.” She crossed her arms in front of her chest, forgetting for a moment that the Targaryen girl had never seen snow before, had never dealt with the extreme Winter cold before and had every right to be worried about Arya’s well being. “I’m a Stark. We don’t freeze.” She shrugged her shoulders and threw the door towards the garden open.

A shiver rolled down her spine when her bare feet touched the cold snow, but it was a shiver of the good and pleasant kind. Quickly she bent down and filled her hand with snowflakes to watch them melt in her palms. “Father used to love cold winters and layers of snow covering our garden.” She whispered and thought about the pictures in her baby album, showing her with her parents and elder siblings next to a snowman even bigger than she had been at the time.

“I think you’re asking for a cold.” Daenerys unexpectedly appeared behind Arya and when Arya turned around she saw how ridiculous her girlfriend looked. Daenerys wore at least three sweaters and four pairs of socks. The sleeves of her sweaters were folded around her knuckles and her bright white hair was hidden under two hats in the most disgusting colours.

Arya really tried not to laugh, but she lost the fight after not even a second. “There’s no such thing as a cold.” She cocked her head. “It’s a stupid excuse for catching a nasty virus.”

“Actually…” Daenerys locked her glance with Arya’s and smiled an almost mocking smile. “It’s called a cold, because walking around in the cold takes up so much energy that your immune system is weakened. And with a weaker immune system you’re more likely to catch that nasty virus.” She grabbed one of her hats and placed it on Arya’s head.

Just as quickly Arya however grabbed it and took it off again. “I’m a Stark! I’m stronger than Winter!”

“You’re a Stark, yes, but that doesn’t mean you can simply walk around in your thin nightclothes and on bare feet without being punished for it.”

“I can!” Arya stuck out her tongue and to prove her point she sat down on the ground and started the building of a snow man.

She had no idea how much time had passed when the snow man was finally done.

Just like once upon a time the snowman was bigger that Arya herself and he wore the ridiculous hat Daenerys had given her on his head. Little black stones formed his eyes and mouth and the buttons on his belly. For his nose she’d have to ask her mother for a carrot later.

“See?” Arya turned around and smiled when she saw Daenerys with clattering teeth and her arms firmly wrapped around her. “I still don’t feel cold yet. I’m a true Stark.” She stepped back to admire her work once more.

“Is that why your toes are blue?” Daenerys pointed at Arya’s bare feet and Arya shrugged her shoulders when she saw that her toes were indeed a little blueish.

And now Daenerys had mentioned it, maybe they also stung a little, just like her hands and ears. But of course, that was not something Arya would admit, not after all her bragging.

“The snowman needs a nose.” She headed for the door and entered the house again, but as soon as the warmth of her home met with her frozen skin a scream escaped Arya’s lips.

Quickly Daenerys placed both her hands firmly on Arya’s shoulders and shook her. “What’s wrong? What’s happening? Are you okay?”

Arya wanted to nod, but she had to bite her lip to prevent herself from screaming even more and even louder. “It will pass…” She hissed between her teeth and counted to ten, to a hundred, to a thousand.

Eventually the feeling she was burning faded. Her toes, blueish only fifteen minutes ago, were now bright red as if she had taken a way too hot bath. The condition of her fingers wasn’t much better and if she had not known that it was impossible, she would have though that her ears had fallen off too.

“Arya Stark!” Catelyn rushed into the kitchen and shook her head when she saw her daughter, soaked from head to toe and shivering. “How often do I need to tell you that you’re not immune for cold?”

Arya bent her head and she brushed Daenerys’ shoulder when she heard her laugh. “I didn’t die, did I?”

Catelyn raised her eyebrows. “No, but your fingers and toes could have died. Which means that you could have just singlehandedly ended your fencing career.”

Arya felt her cheeks heating up even more when she realised her mother had a point.

“Now, the two of you, get upstairs and take a warm bath.” She winked. “I will give the poor snowman a nose and the rest of the day the two of you will spent on the couch watching Netflix under a few layers of blankets.”

“Excuse me, but I didn’t do anything wrong.” Daenerys spoke softly, but firmly. “I was very well dressed for the occasion.” She lifted her chin and straightened her back.

Catelyn however didn’t let the young girl intimidate her. “You’re supposed to have a good influence on my daughter and you failed.”

“It’s impossible to have any influence at all on your daughter.” Daenerys wrapped an arm around Arya’s shoulders and pecked Arya’s cheek. “That’s one of the many reasons why I’ve fallen in love with her.”

Catelyn curled her lips up into a smile. “Then you won’t mind keeping her company while she sits out her punishment either.”

“Arya Stark!” Catelyn rushed into the kitchen and shook her head when she saw her daughter, soaked from head to toe and shivering. “How often do I need to tell you that you’re not immune for cold?”

Arya bent her head and she brushed Daenerys’ shoulder when she heard her laugh. “I didn’t die, did I?”

Catelyn raised her eyebrows. “No, but your fingers and toes could have died. Which means that you could have just singlehandedly ended your fencing career.”

Arya felt her cheeks heating up even more when she realised her mother had a point.

“Now, the two of you, get upstairs and take a warm bath.” She winked. “I will give the poor snowman a nose and the rest of the day the two of you will spent on the couch watching Netflix under a few layers of blankets.”

“Excuse me, but I didn’t do anything wrong.” Daenerys spoke softly, but firmly. “I was very well dressed for the occasion.” She lifted her chin and straightened her back.

Catelyn however didn’t let the young girl intimidate her. “You’re supposed to have a good influence on my daughter and you failed.”

“It’s impossible to have any influence at all on your daughter.” Daenerys wrapped an arm around Arya’s shoulders and pecked Arya’s cheek. “That’s one of the many reasons why I’ve fallen in love with her.”

Catelyn curled her lips up into a smile. “Then you won’t mind keeping her company while she sits out her punishment either.”
trail.content_abstract:
Written for day 2 of @asoiafrarepairs week round 2 based on the prompt “Burning OR Freezing”

When Arya wakes up she notices that it snows and rushes outside, convinced she’s immune to cold. Daenerys, her girlfriend, isn’t so certain about that, but she has never seen snow before.

modern au

“It’s snowing!” Arya rushed to her window and a smile spread across her face when she saw the bright white tapestry in front of her. “Come on! I want to be the first to set foot into it!” She reached for Daenerys’ hand and pulled the girl along down the stairs.

“Dressed like this?” Daenerys raised her eyebrows and freed her hand from Arya’s strong hold. “You will freeze to death!”

Arya rolled her eyes. “Of course not.” She crossed her arms in front of her chest, forgetting for a moment that the Targaryen girl had never seen snow before, had never dealt with the extreme Winter cold before and had every right to be worried about Arya’s well being. “I’m a Stark. We don’t freeze.” She shrugged her shoulders and threw the door towards the garden open.

A shiver rolled down her spine when her bare feet touched the cold snow, but it was a shiver of the good and pleasant kind. Quickly she bent down and filled her hand with snowflakes to watch them melt in her palms. “Father used to love cold winters and layers of snow covering our garden.” She whispered and thought about the pictures in her baby album, showing her with her parents and elder siblings next to a snowman even bigger than she had been at the time.

“I think you’re asking for a cold.” Daenerys unexpectedly appeared behind Arya and when Arya turned around she saw how ridiculous her girlfriend looked. Daenerys wore at least three sweaters and four pairs of socks. The sleeves of her sweaters were folded around her knuckles and her bright white hair was hidden under two hats in the most disgusting colours.

Arya really tried not to laugh, but she lost the fight after not even a second. “There’s no such thing as a cold.” She cocked her head. “It’s a stupid excuse for catching a nasty virus.”

summary: HBO released a trailer for its 2019 lineup. It includes another short peek at GoT Season 8.  Between 0:48 and 0:53 there’s Arya...
caption:
HBO released a trailer for its 2019 lineup. It includes another short peek at GoT Season 8.

Between 0:48 and 0:53 there’s Arya seeing a dragon for the first time. There are also Unsullied troops – all presumably at Winterfell. And at the opening and closing of the vid, we see ravens flying near The Wall.

There’s also what appears to be be Season 7(?) footage of the Night King on the undead Viserion bringing down part of The Wall.

tags: god these people are so annoying
summary: 'aRyA dOeSnT cArE aBoUt ThE sMaLlFoLk!', baby girl dead ass beat joffery baratheon over the head with a stick because he was...
body:
‘aRyA dOeSnT cArE aBoUt ThE sMaLlFoLk!’, baby girl dead ass beat joffery baratheon over the head with a stick because he was torturing her friend- a butchers boy, need I remind you, then proceeded to swing his sword into the river so he couldn’t hurt her friend any more than he already had. Befriends nearly everyone she meets, sleeps and eats with the common folk, does her best to protect them and serves justice to those who would hurt them.


‘dEaNeRyS dOeSnT cArE aBoUt ThE sMaLlFoLk!’ sweetie pie took many women and young girls under her protection as a khaleesi to prevent them from being raped. Legit freed thousands upon thousands of small folk and actual slaves (with no other motive than freeing them from their binds), continues to do her best to keep them safe and punishes those who would do them harm or put them back in chains.

blog.name: omgellendean
blog.title: Catelyn Stark was mean to the godswood

body:
Quick Overanalysis

(not just of yesterday trailer, but of previous content as well)

  • Judging by roofs and walls in the background, as well as the fact that  Arya wears a necktie (told you, it’s an overanalysis), it seems that she sees Drogon and the Unsullied not at Winterfell, but in the winter town. I guess people seeking shelter for winter already started to gather there, and Arya was helping them.
  • Jon and Dany definitely will fly to Winterfell, I see it in their red and chapped faces.
  • Jon seems to have an identity crisis even before the big reveal. He doesn’t have his armour and gorget, his new coat and belt (the one I previously mistook for trimming) look really simple and even Longclaw isn’t in the sight. Poor guy finds reasons to suffer everywhere.
  • I guess Brienne outran Dany’s party and arrived at Winterfell earlier. The real question is, has anybody else arrived earlier? 
  • Where is Theon? Where are they hiding him?

summary: Game of Thrones Season 8 Trailer +Stark & Lannister Teaser Gallery
title: Game of Thrones Season 8 Trailer +Stark & Lannister Teaser Gallery
body:
New Post has been published on https://filmreviewonline.com/2019/02/25/game-of-thrones-season-8-trailer-stark-lannister-teaser-gallery/

Game of Thrones Season 8 Trailer +Stark & Lannister Teaser Gallery

Check out the Game of Thrones Season 8 Teaser Trailer. PLUS The recently released Stark & Lannister Character Teaser Gallery for the season.

Game of Thrones Season 8 Trailer & Teaser Gallery

Game of Thrones Season 8 credits

HBO Game of Thrones Season 8 announced Sunday, April 14, 2019 as the debut date for the show’s six-episode, eighth and final season. As in previous seasons, the series will air at 9:00 pm (ET/PT), exclusively on HBO in USA. Airs on Sky / Now TV in the UK.

Directors for the new season are: David Benioff & DB Weiss, David Nutter and Miguel Sapochnik. Writers for the new season are: David Benioff & D.B. Weiss, Bryan Cogman and Dave Hill.

Season seven credits: The executive producers of Game of Thrones are David Benioff, DB Weiss, Carolyn Strauss, Frank Doelger and Bernadette Caulfield; co-executive producers, Bryan Cogman, Guymon Casady, Vince Gerardis and George RR Martin.

HBO’s only official detail of Season 8!

Game of Thrones Season 8 Gallery

#GameOfThrones #HBO #Trailer

summary: “Why should I wager my feet for the chance to sweat in Winterfell in place of Harrenhal? You know old Ben Blackthumb? He came...
text:
“Why should I wager my feet for the chance to sweat in Winterfell in place of Harrenhal? You know old Ben Blackthumb? He came here as a boy. Smithed for Lady Whent and her father before her and his father before him, and even for Lord Lothston who held Harrenhal before the Whents. Now he smiths for Lord Tywin, and you know what he says? A sword’s a sword, a helm’s a helm, and if you reach in the fire you get burned, no matter who you’re serving. Lucan’s a fair enough master. I’ll stay here.”
“The queen will catch you, then. She didn’t send gold cloaks after Ben Blackthumb!”
“Likely it wasn’t even me they wanted.”
“It was too, you know it. You’re somebody.”
“I’m a ‘prentice smith, and one day might be I’ll make a master armorer … if I don’t run off and lose my feet or get myself killed.” He turned away from her, picked up his hammer once more, and began to bang.
Arya’s hands curled into helpless fists. “The next helm you make, put mule’s ears on it in place of bull’s horns!” She had to flee, or else she would have started hitting him. He probably wouldn’t even feel it if I did. When they find who he is and cut off his stupid mulehead, he’ll be sorry he didn’t help. She was better off without him anyhow. He was the one who got her caught at the village.

tags: like i know a lot of arya fans who don’t really like dany but i almost never see *them* pulling shit like this
summary: Honestly, the GoT fandom just depresses me. We get a short, sweet clip about Arya (Dany doesn’t even figure in it! Leave her...
body:
Honestly, the GoT fandom just depresses me. We get a short, sweet clip about Arya (Dany doesn’t even figure in it! Leave her alone!) and how she seems genuinely happy when seeing Drogon for the first time and for me, a book reader, whose disappointment with the show has been growing since S5, this clip is one of those rare moments that let me catch a glimpse of what’s to come in TWoW/ADoS, but when I search the Arya Stark tags, it’s filled with anti Dany content.

Like, I know most show watchers haven’t read the books nor care about them and I know most antis only ever use book material when it suits their wishes, but even so, you can’t get around the fact that Arya and Dany have similar personalities and will probably get along well. Even in the show, there’s nothing that hints at a possible conflict between Arya and Dany. Absolutely nothing.

Aren’t antis getting tired of hating Dany? Can’t they let us enjoy Arya content without dragging her and Dany’s name through the mud? Can’t they stop using Arya’s character to hate on Dany?

Generally, Arya and Dany fans get along famously well. I’ve even seen a Jonsa shipper describe it as an, and I quote, “unholy alliance”. Well, guess what, maybe, we just support each other because we don’t deem it necessary to use a five seconds clip to further our anti agenda.

trail.content:
Honestly, the GoT fandom just depresses me. We get a short, sweet clip about Arya (Dany doesn’t even figure in it! Leave her alone!) and how she seems genuinely happy when seeing Drogon for the first time and for me, a book reader, whose disappointment with the show has been growing since S5, this clip is one of those rare moments that let me catch a glimpse of what’s to come in TWoW/ADoS, but when I search the Arya Stark tags, it’s filled with anti Dany content.

Like, I know most show watchers haven’t read the books nor care about them and I know most antis only ever use book material when it suits their wishes, but even so, you can’t get around the fact that Arya and Dany have similar personalities and will probably get along well. Even in the show, there’s nothing that hints at a possible conflict between Arya and Dany. Absolutely nothing.

Aren’t antis getting tired of hating Dany? Can’t they let us enjoy Arya content without dragging her and Dany’s name through the mud? Can’t they stop using Arya’s character to hate on Dany?

Generally, Arya and Dany fans get along famously well. I’ve even seen a Jonsa shipper describe it as an, and I quote, “unholy alliance”. Well, guess what, maybe, we just support each other because we don’t deem it necessary to use a five seconds clip to further our anti agenda.
